channel.title: Players drop certain item on death
channel.description:
Let's say I want to make it so the players drop 20m when they die. I went to the youdied void and added [code]dropItem(995,20000000);[/code]
It didn't work. What else should I try?

item.title: Players drop certain item on death
item.dc:creator: @xweetok599 xweetok599
item.description:
@xweetok599 wrote:

Maybe it will be usefull for people (iinclusive me, i want to do it too, lol) when u say HOW you did it…

Read full topic
item.source: Players drop certain item on death

item.title: Players drop certain item on death
item.dc:creator: @daved daved
item.description:
@daved wrote:

Nope it doesn’t work like that because the 0995 is not recognized by the console.

When you code you use 995, believe me I tried in all the ways possible.

Edit: Fixed it, topic can be locked.

Read full topic
item.source: Players drop certain item on death
